thread.title: BRIEF-Horizon Global Board Of Directors Appoints Carl Bizon, Current President Of Horizon Global Americas, Interim President And Chief Executive Officer

title: BRIEF-Horizon Global Board Of Directors Appoints Carl Bizon, Current President Of Horizon Global Americas, Interim President And Chief Executive Officer
text:
Market News May 8, 2018 / 12:00 PM / in 14 minutes BRIEF-Horizon Global Board Of Directors Appoints Carl Bizon, Current President Of Horizon Global Americas, Interim President And Chief Executive Officer Reuters Staff 1 Min Read
May 8 (Reuters) - Horizon Global Corp:
* HORIZON GLOBAL BOARD OF DIRECTORS APPOINTS CARL BIZON, CURRENT PRESIDENT OF HORIZON GLOBAL AMERICAS, INTERIM PRESIDENT AND CHIEF EXECUTIVE OFFICER
* HORIZON GLOBAL CORP - APPOINTMENT FOLLOWS BOARD’S ACCEPTANCE OF MARK ZEFFIRO’S RESIGNATION FROM HIS EXECUTIVE POSITIONS AND AS A DIRECTOR Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
